website_summaries.verdict: A large, well-constructed shaving soap bowl that can accommodate shaving soaps of all sizes.
pros: A durable stainless steel shaving bowl that is easy to clean
Suits all kinds of shaving soaps
Wide bowl makes it easy to whip up a good lather without splashing soap everywhere
cons: Despite dual layers, some say it doesn't retain heat well

customer_reviews.title: Amazing depuffing mask
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these undereye masks! I tried it for the first time last night after placing them in the fridge for 30 minutes and the results are amazing. No more bags. I love how it actually depuffs and leave my skin feeling smooth. Will definitely try these again! #CoffeeForTheUndereyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: These feel great! I've only used one so I haven't seen magical results but not expecting that. I will update once I've used a few.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stainless!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't stainless steel. It is plated plastic or lightweight pot metal. The item description is misleading. Picture the chrome plastic parts in your car interior, now turn that into a bowl. I work in constructing water utilities and deal with various pipe materials, and I see REAL stainless daily, in various shapes and sizes. This isn't it and you don't need to be an expert to see it. Fake review alert if people hold this and think "quality"
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shave Bowl
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as advertised. It's double wall stainless steel. This makes it light. If this bowl was solid steel it'd be a bit clunky - it'd definitely be a toe smasher in the shower if it was solid steel! So the double wall construction is a good thing. Also steel is strong, so you don't need it to be a heavy clunky piece to get the job done. The inside is polished smooth which is excellent for lathering. The middle part of the exterior is brushed giving it some texture so it's less slippy than if it was polished. And as advertised, it's bigger than most shaving bowls allowing folks like myself more room to work the lather.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: Dentedx2
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one, it arrived dented. The outer box was fine. The bubble wrap wasn't popped. The bowl just had a dent. So, I sent for a replacement and got the exact same thing. These must be leaving the factory dented.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Highly impressed with the effectiveness of these, considering the ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly impressed with the effectiveness of these, considering the low price and the high 20 pack. I have a issue with bags, dark circles and under eye dryness. So I made the decision to do something about it. I was pleasantly surprised at how smooth and soft and skin felt afterwards. I was so excited about how my skin felt after just the first use...also how much easier it made to pile on buy concealer without the deep creasing. I just ORDERED my next BOX.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaving bowl that did not cost much
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shaving bowl. It is double-insulated and works great. I put hot water in and soak my shaving brush as I shower. Once I get out, the brush hairs are soaked and the bowl retains the heat. It is very easy to whip up a lather. I used Proraso Shaving Cream (in the tube). The brush and shaving cream stayed warm throughout the shave. It is stainless steel and not plastic as another reviewer claimed. It worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Boy

customer_reviews.title: I definitely like this soap bowl 😊
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice soap bowl. It's on the large size, but it will hold two 3.5 ounce melted soap pucks. Even though it is stainless steel, since it is so smooth, I was able to melt the soap in it in my microwave. I heated it up in 15 second increments and stirred it in between. You can see my results in the attached photos. DISCLAIMER: Microwave ovens are different. This might not be safe to do in yours.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better
customer_reviews.text: Big, unbreakable and light weight. Bigger is better as long as your brush doesn't fall in. I found a way to have warm shaving cream in a 60 degree bathroom. I preheat the bowl with my wife's hair dryer then put a dab of shaving cream in the bowl and run some hot water on my brush. The shaving cream stays warm for a second application. I may not do this for summer but nice in a 60 degree bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to whip up a great lather, yet still fit's in the palm of ...
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to whip up a great lather, yet still fit's in the palm of my hand comfortably. My 22 mm brush fits great in this bowl. Plenty of room to work my Proraso Shave Cream. I have a 24 mm brush that I haven't tried in this bowl yet, but it should work great also. This bowl looks great on my counter with my chrome stand, chrome handled razor and chrome handled brush.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shave Bowl You'll Find
customer_reviews.text: I've spent a long searching for the perfect shaving bowl. I've tried Edwin Jagger's, Muhle's, cereal bowls, everything, and this is far and away the best. It retains heat and can sit in the sink, is wide and slick to make the perfect lather, and it's a third of the price of most competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Paul TT

customer_reviews.title: First Experience
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using the masks... overall great experience! As recommended you should try to rest/ sleep because masks began to slide out of position several times, but I just readjust them. I have not been using masks routinely however I hope to see improvements under my eyes. I'm unsure how many days/weeks it takes for improvements to be noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: camillef

customer_reviews.title: Works well to build up rich lather with brush and shaving cream!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Shaving Cream (not tried with shaving soap). Hollow design makes it float high in a larger basin of water. (Not a flaw—a result of being double hulled.) I held it down in hot water with an previously heated old aluminum block (1”x1”x3”).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Bowl Refinement at its Best!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bowl. I look forward to using it each morning. Has a nice matte finish on the outside and polished steel inside. Retains heat well. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jack1999

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This lathering bowl meets all expectations. It is nicely finished, it has plenty of room for the brush to build lather, it is light and will not shatter if you lose your grip with soapy fingers, and the double wall construction insulates against cold counters. All for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they are effective
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to use every once awhile. I am not sure of their effectiveness however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice large size so you can easily move the brush ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Nice large size so you can easily move the brush around to create lather. Great mirrored finish that cleans up quickly and easily. ...and of course it's stainless steel so there's no worry about dropping and breaking it on all the hard surfaces in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Feels lightweight and thin
customer_reviews.text: The size and mouth opening are what I was looking for. Finding I can work up a good lather in it and fits good in my XL sized hand. A short pre-soak with hot water seems to hold heat for a warm lather build up. Was expecting a bit more heft/weight to the bowl. Feels very lightweight and thin. Have had it for less than a week so will see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Gene D.

customer_reviews.title: Good bowl. I guess I could have used a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bowl. I guess I could have used a drinking dish from a petco but this is nice and cheap. It does hold a full sized soap cake in the bottom so that's a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good size for developing lather
customer_reviews.text: Good size for developing lather. Rather thin, lightweight metal. Will float in sink, but will capsize if you put brush in it. It is just the right size to put on a "candle warmer" to keep lather warm.
customer_reviews.author: RayClem

customer_reviews.title: He liked the idea that it heats up and is wide ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for someone else but when my brother saw it, he immediately said he wanted one so I guess it is a real winner! He liked the idea that it heats up and is wide enough for any size shaving soap. I ordered another one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Niemczyk

customer_reviews.title: Shave bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice large bowl will accommodate most any shaving soap and brush only wish it had a lid
customer_reviews.author: Dboatner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shave Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal shaving bowl. Very lightweight. The perfect size to hold in the palm of your hand while mixing shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jimhadar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size bowl for lathering or storing shave soap, or both.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: I needed a bowl that was good quality and the right size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. I needed a bowl that was good quality and the right size. This one meets the need. A+
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Eric D. Jackson Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl, well made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bowl, well made, good weight. Bought as part of the set for my husband and couldn't be happier. He was impressed!
customer_reviews.author: meljoj

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and workmanship but not sure how long will last,very light weight material
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ameer Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice stainless bowl and I like the size
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice stainless bowl and I like the size. I wish it had some ridges in the bottom to help build lather.
customer_reviews.author: trmcrhodes

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Big bowl, bigger than it looks. Great steel, looks like this will last a while
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaving Bowl!  2nd Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bowl and was purchased because I accidentally left my other at a hotel recently. This is a great product that provides plenty of room to lather shaving cream. This is a quality product and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: might be better if you sandpaper the inside a bit
customer_reviews.text: The very smooth inside does not work well for producing a large amount of lather, might be better if you sandpaper the inside a bit. Cheap, good size (fit your shaving cream container inside) and unbreakable mean it is good for travelling though.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Pen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality people. Exactly what I wanted for shaving.
customer_reviews.author: California Bill

customer_reviews.title: You're better off getting the smaller
customer_reviews.text: The brush doesn't stay in place, keeps falling into the bowl. You're better off getting the smaller bowl
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large -- hold soap Bar, or foam spray -- just warm with hot water from tap.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ...........
customer_reviews.text: Great little bowl that is lightweight and bigger than normal shave bowls....love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mav2Knight

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with my art of shaving hardware
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shaving bowl at the right price. High quality brushed nickel. Nice shiny chrome and looks great with expensive shaving sets. If for some reason I needed 2 shaving bowls, I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Judah M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great large shaving bowl. Make sure you buy big soap bars.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: little bit bigger than I anticipated but good none the less
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fecht

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy shave bowl
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy shave bowl. Unbreakable but light weight and fits comfortable in hand but has a wide area, good for lathering.
customer_reviews.author: Olde Hounde

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, hubs needed a better bowl for shaving since his glass one shattered. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Simons

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Not as hefty as I wanted and too big to fit in my large medicine cabinet but it get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bowl is great! Input my foam in there and a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is great! Input my foam in there and a little bit of water and was able to work up a great lather that lasted well into two passes. Would hight recommend this bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Jpp

customer_reviews.title: The size is good and it doesn't get too hot when sitting in ...
customer_reviews.text: The bowl works well for me. The size is good and it doesn't get too hot when sitting in warm water. It's hard to believe it's metal because it's very light but it does the job of being shaving cream bowl well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Get more shaves out of your shaving cream or soap
customer_reviews.text: The right size, a good “feel”, and a great price. Whether you use shaving soap or shaving cream, this is the perfect bowl to whip up a rich lather with a minimum of soap or cream.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great dish. Large enough to mix well and make ...
customer_reviews.text: Great dish. Large enough to mix well and make plenty of foam. Does need regular cleaning as rinsing won't remove shave foam film.
customer_reviews.author: G1TPA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shaving bowl. Larger size makes it easy to use and keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Nichas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaving Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Gorgeous! This Bowl Arrived on time and in perfect condition. It's everything I hoped for and then some! Works really good, its an Upgrade from my Harris and Co birtchwood Bowl, love the soap but bowl was to small. My Merkur set came with a beautiful frosted glass bowl, buts its too small also. I have sensitive skin and I need YUGE lather! This bowl makes my setup POP!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas's

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Large size, doesnt tip over like previous reviews say. Cant beat the price.. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: thomas harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bowl. Inexpensive, but doesn't look it. Whips up a lather with no worries!
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The finish is very nice, however l, the bowl does not feel very durable. It is extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice size to work with - very nice and delivered in good time - thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jimi Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression: Just got the bowl and it was much lighter than i expected. When i read double wall stainless steel i expected to feel some heft to it. It was rather light. The inside layer that is polished actually looked like plastic covered chrome so i had to tap on it just to see if it was metal. Very very thin gauge metal though. A slightly heavier bowl would help the impression of quality. . I will update this as i use the bowl
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shaving bowl for me, perfect size, looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaving bowl! It remains warm after putting hot water in it while I'm in the shower. It's the perfect size and shape for my hands. Made a great replacement for the salad bowl I had previously used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Good shaving bowl at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Double walled stainless steel bowl. Helps keep the heat in the soap and not your hand. It is large and will not fit in a standard sized bathroom cabinet but appears to be well made and worth the money. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a large bowl that makes it easy to get a good lather built. I melted a large puck of shaving soap into the bowl so it fills up the bottom of the bowl and still leaves plenty of room to get my lather going.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Bibbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size and quality. It stated double walled and from the photo it looked like it might have had holes on the bottom for drainage somehow but no. It was an optical illusion.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaving soap
customer_reviews.text: Hollow core makes this a little lighter than I expected. Works great and is wide enough to accommodate almost any shaving soap bar.
customer_reviews.author: My name

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless. Immediately loses any heat. Threw away after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great for firming undereye area
customer_reviews.text: I use these every night, I put them on before bed and sleep with them for at least a couple of hours and will then take them off. I wish I had taken photos of before and after, fine lines under my eyes are visibly smoother, I love these things and wish I had discovered them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: BVJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product - Need to double check before you ship though.
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear. It's very nice bowl. But my quam is when I receive a package that has not visible damage to it, only to find the product has dents on both sides of it once I remove from the package. Justice Shaving - you need to make sure you check your products before you ship them out.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaving Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: After dropping and breaking my last shaving bowl I decided to get one that did not break when dropped. This stainless steel bowl fills the need. It is both strong and light weight. Fits in the hand really well and you can whip up a lot of lather with it. Other bowls I have had have been too small and more lather fell outside than stayed in the bowl. This bowl does not have that issue. Just the right weight and feel and size.
customer_reviews.author: L. Araiza

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I have my doubts about this product. Claims to be stainless, but it's so light and cheap feeling. I expected it to be hollow, but I can only imagine how thin this for it to be so light. Couldn't believe they charge over $10 for this. Calling it a shaving bowl is pure marketing, it's a generic metal bowl with a smooth interior, any bowl will do just as well. Judging by the account selling all these JSC products (Hanna Import and Distributing), I'm guessing they found a factory somewhere to make this dirt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyhead

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but could use some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bowl looks great but it doesn't really retain heat the way I thought it would even if I let hot water sit in it while washing my face and using a scrub pre-shave. Also a silicone lid would be nice so I could leave my soap in the bowl without worrying about dust or hair falling into it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav S.

customer_reviews.title: The bowl to end all bowls
customer_reviews.text: As far as bowls go, this is definitely a bowl, not much room for error. but it bowls better than many other bowls I have dared to bowl with. Durable, aesthetically pleasing and does not interfere with soaps at all. ...bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bowl itself seems to be very good. It fits well in my hand (which is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first shave bowl, so I really have nothing with which to compare it (except a too small mug). The bowl itself seems to be very good. It fits well in my hand (which is not large), it's light, and the size allows me to generate a good lather. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Music Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bowl after looking at many different bowls and I am beyond happy with my purchase. For one, the company personally emails you to make sure everything is good and that you are happy with your purchase, which I think is awesome. Great customer service! The product itself is a perfect size, it’s been real easy to get a great lather out of this bowl. It keeps the water warm for a long period(when softening the brush), it’s nice and shiney, and it matches my other shaving products! I highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy bowl that works well for its purpose. In constrast to some of the other reviews here, mine did NOT arrive damaged as others described nor were there any defects. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zuidema

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and moisturizing eye pads
customer_reviews.text: I love these, Whether traveling and relieving tired puffy eyes or just sitting in my living room, These eye mask refresh and sooth under eyes
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: It came wrapped safely and the quality looks great. I am positive that he will love it
customer_reviews.text: The shaving bowl I bought for a Christmas gift for my husband. It came wrapped safely and the quality looks great. I am positive that he will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bowl was as advertised and the right size for my shaving needs. Great product and great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Warner

customer_reviews.title: I can achieve a great lather with this bowl
customer_reviews.text: I can achieve a great lather with this bowl. It's wide enough that I can really whip the shave cream into a lather without getting the cream all over my fingers and the brush handle. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool in my bathroom next to my metal stand for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than it looks. Looks cool in my bathroom next to my metal stand for my safety razor, brush, and straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Large diameter facilitates creating the perfect lather with either shaving cream or soap
customer_reviews.text: Just the bowl I was looking for. Large diameter facilitates creating the perfect lather with either shaving cream or soap. Bowl is very stable and will not tip over when shaving brush is placed in bowl while shaving. When bowl is warmed with hot water, double wall construction helps retain heat for a warm lather. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: R P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I can comfortably hold the bowl in one hand and mix the lather with the other. It's large enough for the job, but has a small footprint and takes up little space on the countertop. Cleans up very easily after use.
customer_reviews.author: nealwol

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl, sturdy, well made, works well, looks good on the counter. It could probably benefit from having some ribs added to the bottom/sides but I'm still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MOSE717

customer_reviews.title: Yowza!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is awesome. Used it for the first time last night. So much better than using my hand or my face to create lather. Aesthetically it matches my stand and razor so that's a plus. Can't wait to get home and lather up some soap tonight.
customer_reviews.author: Gregular

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very large bowl and appears double walled but does not heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great Bowl. It hold the heat and is big enough for my Parker Safety Razor 100% Silvertip Badger Brush to get a superior lather. It looks great on the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes morning shave even more satisfying.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Double wall provides a bit of insulation. I can whip up a great lather in this.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and it is functional. I love it and recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving bowl
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. Very durable, accidentally dropped it on tile floor, no dents or scratches.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Big bowl
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and solid. Larger than I expected, but works well. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Naduals

customer_reviews.title: Terrific diameter, plenty to properly mix water
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Terrific diameter, plenty to properly mix water, soap and brush into a great larger (plus the bowl retains heat well).
customer_reviews.author: Mongoose

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Great bowl! I use this to whip up shaving cream for shaving. Would buy again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. A large bowl - if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. A large bowl - if you have small hands this may not be your best choice
customer_reviews.author: Tribal Elder

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great shaving bowl! Does the job and it looks good on my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice looking stainless steel bowl
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned that this bowl was plastic. It's not, it's just so light that it felt that way. This is a very nice looking stainless steel bowl.
customer_reviews.author: sleddriver

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking wet shaving bowl
customer_reviews.text: Quality is Exceptional. Great bowl for shaving. Looks great in any modern style Bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It's bigger than I'd pictured it, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy. Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as expected. Very happy. Perfect size. Helped create great lather with badger brush.
customer_reviews.author: fish10186

customer_reviews.title: Use a bowl not a mug.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the shaving brush, mugs don't even compare.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: I use this for travel because my other is ceramic. Great bowl Sturdy enough to take on vacation
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: does exactly as advertised. It serves purpose and looks good. Great price
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Size does make the difference!
customer_reviews.text: You need a bigger bowl than average, if you want good lather. This is it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilah S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect size for shaving soap pucks. I've paired this with a small bowl for use when I use creams.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Owens

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: crafted well, keeps the temperature, and is wide to make the lather
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowl 👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized bowl that builds plenty of lather. That's it that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for shaving soap users
customer_reviews.text: The bowl is much bigger than I suspected, but it works great with my shaving soap and helps work up a great lather. I had been using wood bowls that came with my soap but that stained my counter. This keeps the heat nicely, the soap fits, and it stays nice and clean. The construction is solid as well and it feels good in the hand. My photo shows a large puck inserted to gauge size. Like another reviewer mentioned, it is probably an awesome ice-cream bowl too!
customer_reviews.author: Stubb

customer_reviews.title: Description is deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Bowl works well a shaving bowl, but I was very disappointed in the weight of the bowl. I do not know what it is made of but I highly doubt it is double was stainless steel and it is not worth 12 bucks. My shaving brush weighs more than the bowl, so when lay the brush in the bowl it tips over. I guess my search continues for something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Neutron

customer_reviews.title: Very good, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl. Pretty. Affordable. I just wish it had some ridges to assist in whipping up a lather.
customer_reviews.author: Deplorable Bitter Clinger

product_meta.title: Justice Shaving Company Shave Bowl - Dual Layer Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
The Justice Shaving Company Stainless Shave Bowl is a shaving soap dish built with the traditional shaver in mind. It is large enough to accommodate virtually any shaving soap size or shape and has room to use your shave brush to build a rich, thick, luxurious lather. Or if you prefer shaving cream for women or men, it serves equally well. 

For those of you who like to shave your face (or shave your legs) in the shower or bath, this is a lightweight and durable bowl perfect for holding while shaving without the bowl becoming heavy. And being a stainless steel shaving bowl you can move it with confidence because it will not break like ceramic or marble shaving bowls. Even wood shaving bowls are known to crack, but there is no need to worry when you use this polished steel shave cream bowl.

 Add to your cart now and be enjoying a great wet shave experience in a couple of days!

Interior Dimensions: 1-7/8" x 4-3/8"

Exterior Dimensions: 2-1/4" x 4-3/4"

Weight: 3.3 oz
feature_bullets: DURABLE: Metal shaving bowl is much sturdier than a ceramic shaving bowl and withstands being dropped from the counter; make your steel shaving bowl stainless and you can enjoy beauty and durability with a combined chrome-like mirror finish the interiors and rim of the shave bowl

USE WITH CLASSIC SHAVING MUG SOAP OF ANY KIND: Just add your favorite shaving soap refill to this shaving soap dish and use your shaving brush to work your lather. The mirror-finish stands up equally to glycerine shave soap or triple milled or castile shaving soaps

COMBINE WITH OTHER WET SHAVING PRODUCTS: A shaving brush and bowl are the foundation of any wet shave set, whether used as a straight razor shaving bowl or you add a safety razor and a shaving stand for a complete classic shaving set, this stainless shave bowl will mix and match with any color or style (razors, brushes, and stands are not included)

LARGER BOWL: Many shave bowls are just too small and there is no room to effectively use a shave brush to work a lather or they are flat and don't hold curved-bottom soaps well; this bowl has large interior dimensions of 1-7/8" x 4-3/8" and a curved interior bottom perfect for many refill shapes

GENDER NEUTRAL: Used as a women's or mens shaving soap bowl or as a shaving cream bowl for a man or woman; this large metal shaver's bowl is a versatile tool whether shaving your face or shaving your legs!
